summary: Filter an array based on a condition
description: Filters the array elements based on a logical expression so that afterwards an array is returned that only contains the values conforming to the condition.

parameters.name: condition
parameters.description: A condition that is evaluated against each value in the array. Only the array elements where the condition returns `true` are preserved.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The value of the current element being processed.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The zero-based index of the current element being processed.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: The label of the current element being processed. Only populated for labeled arrays.

returns.description: An array filtered by the specified condition. The number of elements are less than or equal compared to the original array.
